item.title: 5 Tax Breaks for 2025 You Don’t Want to Miss Out On
item.description: Taking advantage of these changes could lower your upcoming tax bill.

item.title: Why a Weak Job Market Pushes Stock Prices Higher
item.description: Payrolls data came in weaker than expected, which raised bets for a Fed rate cut.

item.title: A Neuroscientist’s 5-Step Plan to Upgrade Your Brain
item.description: Neuroscience shows ‘metacognition’ makes you more likely to be successful. Here’s how strengthen this often overlooked skill.

item.title: How Tech Employees Became Disposable
item.description: ‘Employees’ are now ‘workers,’ but that didn’t happen overnight.

item.title: I Interviewed a Neuroscientist 5 Years Ago. His New Warning About AI Should Terrify Every Leader
item.description: The central concern is about insight—those “aha” moments when you see a problem differently.
